attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: Overall just a really bad slow app. Don’t understand how the president himself would put out such a terrible app. It just needs to be deleted at this point it’s getting ridiculous.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review:
This app is the worst app on the App Store it gave no information and should definitely be deleted off the App Store I’m fuming right now that I downloaded it and I have some of my storage taken up by it! Overall a terrible app. 
WOULD NOT RECOMMEND TO ANYONE

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: THIS IS THE WORST APP EVER!!! the second I downloaded it a mysterious box was sent to my house filled with MUTANT RATS AND FROGS! THEY ATE MY DOG, CAT AND PET FISH! The rats and frogs took over my house leaving me and my family in the heat to SUFFER AND DIE! soon after a SWAT TEAM was sent to my house and set it on fire and arrested my whole family EVEN MY 6 YEAR OLD BROTHER! Absolutely disgusting!

attributes.title: please do not get this app
attributes.review: DO NOT get this app it made my phone glitch terribly to where i couldn’t leave the app. i restarted my phone but it was just stuck there it ruined my phone and i had to get a new one. smh

attributes.title: A horrible set up
attributes.review: I was looking for this app to help me choose in the 2020 election but it’s layout is horrendous. Everywhere I looked I saw xenophobic, racist rhetoric and i am appalled. I highly recommend this app be shut down. It legit made me wanna start a revolution in the United States it’s so bad

attributes.title: Black lives matter✊🏾
attributes.review: I dislike trump cause the day he got in the office most people already knew it was gonna be hell I don’t understand why people like him he’s a horrible person and a horrible president #newpresident2020

attributes.title: REPUBLICANS
attributes.review: I left a one star only because I can’t leave zero. This app has been taken over by the LIBERALS. All it does is spew fake news about our commander-in-chief. I can’t find one positive article about him on the app. Those TickTock users are most likely to blame. TRUMP REPUBLICANS: PLEASE LEAVE A ONE STAR REVIEW AND GET THIS APP TAKEN DOWN FOR OUR PRESIDENT!!!!

attributes.title: Worst app ever !!
attributes.review: This app made my phone glitch out so so so much !!! The software is screwed up!! I downloaded this app in hopes of trying to understand the reason people like trump sadly I could not find one I guess their all  racist, homophobic, uneducated idiots ✨✨🧚🧚‍♂️🧚🧚‍♂️🧚🏿‍♀️🧚🏿‍♀️

attributes.title: I have PTSD now 😼✨
attributes.review: This app is absolutely horrible! When I first downloaded it, I was enjoyed, but when opening an app I’m greeted with a Cheeto! A Cheeto! Then it started playing music which cause my brother to go into a seizure! Now he’s in the hospital and I have PTSD. Thanks a lot app. 😤

attributes.title: Worst app ever 🤮
attributes.review: This app right off the bat was broken. A picture of the annoying orange kept appearing. This image caused me nausea and anger at the same time. Not healthy for any human to use this app. Hope it gets deleted for showing such disgusting images.
